name: Planting Time
description:
Hello! Well- This is my new game, made for game jam! I called it Planting Time because i didn't have any better ideas, okay?

Instructions:
Z- Use the item that you're holding.
C- Pick up an item.
X- Throw the item that you're holding.
Left & Right Arrows- Move.

Game is pretty chill and it's not hard. In game there is time and days system. You work from 1PM to 7 PM, at the end of the day all flowers that are in your invetory will dissapear, and you won't get your money back so better don't keep them in inventory for too long!

Update: I fixed a game a little bit.
